title: Super Mario Bros.
short_plot_summary: Mario and his brother Luigi must rescue Princess Peach from the evil Bowser by navigating through various levels and defeating enemies.
explanation: A mushroom, representing the power-ups Mario and Luigi use to grow stronger and gain abilities
A star, symbolizing the invincibility power-up that allows the characters to defeat enemies easily
A turtle, illustrating the common enemy called 'Koopa Troopas' that the characters must defeat in the game
A princess, representing the goal of the game, which is to save Princess Peach from Bowser
A fire, signifying the fireballs Mario and Luigi can throw after obtaining a Fire Flower power-up
